name: Cat Play!
description:
Play as a cat, and following the rhythm, don't let the butterflies touch you.

Hit a butterfly when touching the vertical white lines.

Use S, D,  F or touch on the left to hit the Butterflies on the left.

Use, H, J, K or touch on the right to hit the Butterflies on the right.

Once on the title screen, please click on the pink square to start the game. (Forgot to fix before submitting )
